title: email notifications
extract: Enable or disable email notifications. Email notifications are enabled by default in each account. ... Weekly account activity email (available to Pro accounts and up after 30 days) When a scheduled message fails to send. When a message requires your approval (Business and Enterprise)
extract_html: Enable or disable email notifications. Email notifications are enabled by default in each account. ... Weekly account activity email (available to Pro accounts and up after 30 days) When a scheduled message fails to send. When a message requires your approval (Business and Enterprise)
